name: GBVR - Virtual Trader
description:
It is the year 1999, and a revolutionary technology has just been released - the third party Gameboy Color VR. Simply plug in your Headset and get whisked away to another world.

This release comes with a .pocket version, as well as a ROM for the Gameboy Color. You can also play it in the browser!

Navigate around the free-roam loop of VR and trade with the people you meet. Complete the cycle and return to reality! Explore the infinite loop and remember the locations to navigate and find yourself the most optimal path.

WARNING, THE GAMEBOY COLOR VR HEADSET IS AN EXPERIMENTAL TECHNOLOGY AND PROLONGED USE MAY RESULT IN OVERHEATING (for this reason, it automatically shuts down when it becomes too hot).

Controls:


GameboyKeyboardInteractAZ
Cancel, speed text
BXShow Inventory
StartEnterView Map
SelectShiftMovementD-padArrows/WASD

Credits:
Programming by lkcampbell
Programming and art by Polyducks
Music by Westrayaudio
